hero.title: Specialty Marketplace: ASP Final Project
hero.tagline: A full-stack e-commerce platform developed for the Advanced System Project course at the University of Central Missouri.

ourStory.title: Project Overview
paragraphs: Welcome to the Specialty Marketplace showcase! This application was developed as the final project for the **Advanced System Project (ASP)** course at the **University of Central Missouri (UCM)**.

The primary goal of this project was to design, develop, and implement a comprehensive full-stack web application demonstrating key concepts learned throughout the course. It simulates a niche e-commerce platform, focusing on building robust backend services with Java Spring Boot and a modern, interactive frontend using React.

Key technical features implemented include user authentication (JWT), RESTful API design, product and category management, order processing simulation, and database integration (MySQL/PostgreSQL). While presented as an e-commerce site, the core focus was on the technical architecture and implementation process.
This project serves as a practical demonstration of integrating various technologies to create a functional and scalable web system.

items.title: Full-Stack Integration
items.description: Integrating a React frontend with a Spring Boot backend via REST APIs.

items.title: Backend Development
items.description: Building robust and secure APIs using Java Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, and Spring Security.

items.title: Frontend Development
items.description: Creating a responsive and interactive user interface with React and modern CSS.

items.title: Database Management
items.description: Designing relational database schemas and interacting with data using JPA.

items.title: Authentication & Security
items.description: Implementing JWT-based user authentication and securing endpoints.

meetTheTeam.title: About the Developer
meetTheTeam.intro: This project was developed by a student as part of the coursework requirements.

members.name: NAME***
members.title: Student Developer (UCM ASP)
members.bio: NAME*** designed and built this full-stack application for the Advanced System Project course, demonstrating skills in React, Spring Boot, database management, API integration, and system design.
